text: Kanchanam is a 1996 Indian Malayalam film directed by TN Vasanth Kumar and starring Manoj K Jayan and Srividya in the lead roles.http://www.malayalamcinema.com/userreview_kanchanam-.htm ==Cast== * Srividya as Arundhathi Devi * Manoj K Jayan as James Antony * Thilakan as Jose * Madhupal as Siddhu * Prathapachandran as Adv Swami * Harishree Ashokan as Easho * Jose Pallissery as Pattar * NF Varghese as Prof Ravi * Narendra Prasad as Billiards Menon * Vinduja Menon as Anu *Usharani as Muthassi *Mafia Sasi as Minister's driver *Charuhasan as Minister *Kozhikode Narayanan Nair as Leader *Kanakalatha as Prof Ravi's wife *Sadiq as SP John Scaria *Kanya Bharathi as Meera *Ragini as Khusboo ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Kanchanam
